original_text: And in controversy they shall stand in judgment; and they shall judge it according to my judgments: and they shall keep my laws and my statutes in all mine assemblies; and they shall hallow my sabbaths.
korean_text: 송사하는 일을 재판하되 내 규례대로 재판할 것이며 내 모든 정한 절기에는 내 법도와 율례를 지킬 것이며 또 내 안식일을 거룩하게 하며

sentences.original_text: And in controversy they shall stand in judgment
sentences.korean_translation: 논쟁이 있을 때 그들은 재판을 위해 서게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: and they shall judge it according to my judgments
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 나의 판단에 따라 그것을 판단할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and they shall keep my laws
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 나의 율법을 지킬 것이다

sentences.original_text: and my statutes in all mine assemblies
and they shall hallow my sabbaths
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 나의 안식일을 거룩히 할 것이다
